attributes.action: require all learner drivers to undertake a minimum number of driving lessons with an approved driving instructor and impose a series of post-test measures to restrict and develop new drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the large number of deaths and injuries inviolving new and young drivers it appears that this group would benefit from an increase in both pre and post test training, together with restrictions during the first year of driving / vehicle ownership, including a restriction on the number of passengers carried and the mandatory display of a 'new driver' sign.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
